GK21ttrkhy1u:10: tatra kadācid vānarayūtho giriśikharād avatīrya svecchayā
GK21ttrkhy1u:12: ekas tu tatrāsannavināśaś cāpalād upaviśya stambhe yantracāram
GK21ttrkhy1u:21: asti kaścid gomāyur āhāravicchedāt kṣutkṣāmakaṇṭha itaś ca
GK21ttrkhy1u:26: śabdaḥ / kva vā kīdṛśo vaiṣa śabda iti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:32: atha sā yadā vāyupreritair vṛkṣāgrais spṛśyate /
GK21ttrkhy1u:35: sa tu tasyās sārāsāratāṃ jñātuṃ saṃnikarṣam upaśliṣṭaḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:36: svayaṃ ca kautukād ubhayor mukhayor atāḍayat /
GK21ttrkhy1u:40: paruṣatvāc ca carmaṇaḥ kathamapi na daṃṣṭrābhaṅgam avāptavān /
GK21ttrkhy1u:43: ity adhyavasya bheryā mukhaṃ vidāryāntaḥ praviṣṭaḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:48: asti kasmiṃścit pradeśe parivrāḍ devaśarmā nāma /
GK21ttrkhy1u:51: sa ca na kasyacid api viśvāsaṃ yāti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:52: atha kadācid āṣāḍhabhūtir nāma paravittāpahṛt katham iyam
GK21ttrkhy1u:55: atha kadācid asau parivrājakas tīrthayātrāprasaṅge tena
GK21ttrkhy1u:57: tatra ca kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe nadītīre mātrāntika
GK21ttrkhy1u:66: kṛtaśaucaś cāgatas tam uddeśam āṣāḍhabhūmim api
GK21ttrkhy1u:82: yāvad ahaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā suhṛtsameto madhupānaṃ krtvā
GK21ttrkhy1u:83: āgacchāmi / tāvad apramattayā gṛhe tvayā bhāvyam /
GK21ttrkhy1u:85: atha tasya bhāryā puṃścalī dūtikāsañcoditā śarīrasaṃskāraṃ kṛtvā
GK21ttrkhy1u:89: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā pratyutpannamatiḥ kauśalād ākalpam apanīya
GK21ttrkhy1u:92: kaulikas tu gṛhaṃ praviśya nidrāvaśam agamat /
GK21ttrkhy1u:94: puṃścali / tvadgatam apacāraṃ suhṛdo me varṇayanti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:97: asāv api nirmaryādā prativacanaṃ dātum ārabdhā /
GK21ttrkhy1u:98: punar api cāsau pratibuddhas tāṃ madhyastūṇāyāṃ rajjvā
GK21ttrkhy1u:103: asāv api pratibuddhas tathaiva tām ākroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:106: tantravāyas tu śāṭhyād iyaṃ na kiñcin mamottaraṃ prayacchati
GK21ttrkhy1u:107: ity utthāya tasyās tīkṣṇaśastreṇa nāsikāṃ chittvābravīt /
GK21ttrkhy1u:111: āgatā ca sā tantravāyī dūtikām apṛcchat /
GK21ttrkhy1u:115: dūtikā tu kṛtanigrahā nāsikāṃ darśayantī sāmarṣam āha /
GK21ttrkhy1u:121: kaulikas tu yathāpūrvam eva pratibuddhas tām ākrośat /
GK21ttrkhy1u:122: asāv api duṣṭā bahu dhṛṣṭaram āha /
GK21ttrkhy1u:126: yathāhaṃ kaumāraṃ bhartāraṃ muktvā nānyaṃ parapuruṣaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:132: hṛṣṭamanā bandhavād avamucya pīḍitaṃ ca pariṣvajya śayyām
GK21ttrkhy1u:134: parivrājakas tv ādita evārabhya yathāvṛttam artham abhijñātavān /
GK21ttrkhy1u:137: atha tasyā bhartā nāpito rājakulāt pratyūṣasy āgatya tāṃ bhāryām āha /
GK21ttrkhy1u:142: sā ca duṣṭābhyantarasthaiva kṣuram eva prāhiṇot /
GK21ttrkhy1u:144: nāpitas tam eva tasyāḥ kṣuraṃ pratīpaṃ prāhiṇot /
GK21ttrkhy1u:145: athāsāv ārtaravam ucchaiḥ kṛtvā pāṇinā nāsāpuṭaṃ pramṛjya
GK21ttrkhy1u:151: virūpāṃ kīlapārṣṇilaguḍair atīva hataṃ paścād bāhubandhaś
GK21ttrkhy1u:152: ca tayā saha dharmasthānam upanīto nāpitaḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:153: pṛcchyamānaś cādhikṛtaiḥ kim idaṃ mahad viśasanaṃ svadāreṣu
GK21ttrkhy1u:154: tvayā kṛtam iti yadā bahuśa ucyamāno nottaraṃ prayacchati / tadā
GK21ttrkhy1u:156: niṣpāpaṃ ca parivrāṭ cchūlasthānaṃ nīyamānaṃ nāpitaṃ dṛṣṭvā
GK21ttrkhy1u:173: bhadra / kim evaṃ gate prāptakālaṃ bhavān manyate /
GK21ttrkhy1u:182: asti / kaścid bako vṛddhabhāvāt sukhopāyāṃ vṛttim
GK21ttrkhy1u:186: māma / kim adyāhārakṛtyaṃ nānuṣṭhīyate yathā pureti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:190: mayā yuṣmān āsādya pūrvaṃ prāṇarakṣā kṛtā /
GK21ttrkhy1u:200: tān āsādya punar āgamiṣyāma iti kathayām āsuḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:209: kintv asmād dhradād anyaṃ jalāśayaṃ yuṣmān saṅkrāmayiṣyāmi /
GK21ttrkhy1u:216: asāv api duṣṭamatiḥ krameṇa nītvā kauśalād ajasraṃ tān bhakṣayan
GK21ttrkhy1u:218: kulīrakas tu mṛtyubhayodvigno muhur muhus taṃ prārthitavān /
GK21ttrkhy1u:219: māma / mām api tāvad arhasi mṛtyumukhāt paritrātum iti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:227: nihatā anena durātmanā prajñāpūrvakaṃ te mīnāḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:230: [ abhiyukto yadā paśyen na kāñcid gatim ātmanaḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:231: yudhyamānas tadā prājño mriyeta ripuṇā saha //61// ]
GK21ttrkhy1u:255: tac cāvasthāpyānyayā saha kathāṃ kartum ārabdhā /
GK21ttrkhy1u:256: vāyasas tu tad gṛhītvā viyatā śanair ātmānaṃ darśayan svam ālayaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:265: tat kṛtvā suvarṇasūtram ādāya gata iti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:267: asti / kasmiṃścid vanāntare mahān siṃhaḥ prativasati sma /
GK21ttrkhy1u:269: atha te mṛgās sarvae evābhimukhāḥ praṇatacittā
GK21ttrkhy1u:272: bho mṛgarāja kim anena paralokaviruddhena svāmino nṛśaṃsena
GK21ttrkhy1u:278: vayaṃ tu svāmina ekaikaṃ vanacaraṃ vāreṇa svajātisamutthaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:281: sa tu sarvamṛgājñāpito ruṣitamanāś cintayām āsa /
GK21ttrkhy1u:301: katham anyo 'tra madbhujaparirakṣite vane siṃha iti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:309: asāv api śaśo 'ntarlīnam avahasya bṛhaspatyuśanasor nītiśāstraṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:313: kumārgāpannacitto 'yam asau sapatna iti matvā sahasaiva tasya
GK21ttrkhy1u:316: asti kasyacid rājñas sarvaguṇopetam ananyasadṛśaṃ śayanam /
GK21ttrkhy1u:317: tasmin pracchadapaṭaikadeśe mandavisarpiṇī nāma yūkā prativasati sma /
GK21ttrkhy1u:318: atha tasmiṃṣ ṭiṇṭibho nāma matkuṇo vāyunā preritas sannipatitaḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:319: sa tu tac chayanam atisūkṣmottaracchadam ubhayopadhānaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:320: jāhnavīpulinavipulaṃ paramamṛdu surabhi ca dṛṣṭvā paraṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:322: tatsparśākṛṣṭamanā itaś cetaḥ paribhraman katham api tayā
GK21ttrkhy1u:328: ārye / mayā tāvad ihānekaprakārāṇi māṃsāny āsvāditāni
GK21ttrkhy1u:330: tāni tu rūkṣāṇi picchilāny atuṣṭikarāṇy amanojñāni /
GK21ttrkhy1u:339: tac ca surabhi puṣṭikaraṃ cecchāmy ahaṃ tvatprasādād
GK21ttrkhy1u:345: sā tu dākṣiṇyāt tathā nāmeti pratipannā /
GK21ttrkhy1u:346: kintu naivākāle na cātimṛdubhāge tvayāsya prahartavyam iti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:355: asāv api parthiva ulmukadagdha iva saṃlīnakukṣipradeśas
GK21ttrkhy1u:358: atha matkuṇaś cakitatvād rājavacanaṃ śrutvā śayanād avatīrya
GK21ttrkhy1u:360: śayyāpālair api svāmyādeśāt sunipuṇam anviṣadbhir vastraṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:361: parivartayadbhir antarlīnā mandavisarpiṇī samāsāditā vyāpāditā ca /
GK21ttrkhy1u:365: sa kadācid āhāram anveṣamāṇaḥ kṣapām āsādya kṣutkṣāmagalas
GK21ttrkhy1u:375: kroṣṭukagaṇāḥ ko 'yam iti bhayataraladṛśas sarvā diśaḥ
GK21ttrkhy1u:378: nūnam imāṃ svarūpavikṛtiṃ dṛṣṭvaite palāyantae iti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:387: āpūryamāṇakukṣiḥ kakṣam iva taṃ jambukapūgaṃ bahiḥ kṛtvā
GK21ttrkhy1u:389: ekadā tv asau vividhapiśitanāśitakṣud dikṣu sthitānāṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:390: kroṣṭukānāṃ krośatāṃ ninādaṃ śrutvā tvaritataram uccair ninanāda /
GK21ttrkhy1u:392: atas te siṃhādayas trapayā bhūbhāgadṛṣṭibhājaḥ kaṣṭam aho /
GK21ttrkhy1u:394: kroṣṭāyam ity avadhārya ruṣā taṃ paruṣagiraṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:399: asti / kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe madotkaṭo nāma siṃhaḥ prativasati sma /
GK21ttrkhy1u:401: atha tair bhramadbhir dṛṣṭas sārthavāhaparibhraṣṭa uṣṭraḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:404: idam apūrvaṃ sattvam iha vane pṛcchyatām /
GK21ttrkhy1u:409: tenāpi yathāvṛttam ātmano viyogas sārthavāhāt samākhyātaḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:413: pañcaṣaḍdivasātikrānte ca kāle sarvae eva tae āhāravaikalyād
GK21ttrkhy1u:417: aham anayā rujā na kṣamaḥ pūrvavad āhāraṃ bhavatām utpādayitum /
GK21ttrkhy1u:418: te yūyam ātmārthe 'pi tāvad abhyudgamaṃ kuruta /
GK21ttrkhy1u:422: sādhv anujīvivṛttaṃ madupari bhaktiś ca bhavatām /
GK21ttrkhy1u:433: evam uktvā te 'py utthāya saha krathanakena vanāntaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:436: vināśitā vayam anena svāminā svādhīne 'py arthe /
GK21ttrkhy1u:449: tiṣṭhata yūyaṃ yāvad aham evaitad arthaṃ sampratipādayiṣyāmi /
GK21ttrkhy1u:456: vayaṃ tu sarvae evāhāravaikalyād andhāḥ parikṣīṇaśaktayaś ca/
GK21ttrkhy1u:479: [ tyajed ekaṃ kulasyārthe grāmasyārthe kulaṃ tyajet /
GK21ttrkhy1u:487: ayaṃ tāvad etadavasthaṃ svāminam asmāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā svayam
GK21ttrkhy1u:489: evam abhihitavati vāyase siṃho matibhramam ivārpito na kiñcid apy
GK21ttrkhy1u:491: asāv api punas tatsakāśaṃ gatvā kṛtakavacanaiḥ pratyekaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:493: siṃhāntikaṃ gatair yuṣmābhir evaṃ vaktavyam iti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:494: tataḥ kṛtasaṃvidas saha krathanakena siṃhasakāśaṃ gatāḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:506: ābhyāṃ mama viśiṣṭataraṃ śarīram idam upayujyatām iti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:511: tad aham apy evam eva bravīmi /
GK21ttrkhy1u:515: evam abhivadann eva dvīpigomāyubhyāṃ vidāritobhayakukṣis sadyaḥ
GK21ttrkhy1u:530: bhadre / na śakto mahodadhir mayā sārdham īdṛśaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:536: [ duḥkham ātmā paricchettum evaṃ yogyo na veti vā /
GK21ttrkhy1u:537: evaṃvid yasya vijñānaṃ saphalās tasya buddhayaḥ //126// ]
GK21ttrkhy1u:540: sa kūrma iva durbuddhiḥ kāṣṭhād bhraṣṭo vinaśyati //127// ]
GK21ttrkhy1u:545: asti / kasmiṃścit sarasi kambugrīvo nāma kacchapaḥ prativasati sma /
GK21ttrkhy1u:551: kiṃ punaś ciroṣitaṃ priyamitraṃ kambugrīvam āmantrayāvahe /
GK21ttrkhy1u:555: tato mām apy asmān mṛtyumukhāt trātum arhathaḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:568: tvayā punaś cāpalān na kiñcid vaktavyam /
GK21ttrkhy1u:569: imāṃ tu yaṣṭiṃ madhye daśanair āpīḍaya /
GK21ttrkhy1u:570: evam anayaivoddhṛtya ṣaṣṭimātrāṇi yojanāni mahat saro
GK21ttrkhy1u:577: tac ca śrutvāsannavināśaḥ kacchapo yaṣṭiṃ tyaktvābhihitavān /
GK21ttrkhy1u:584: pātasamakālam eva tīkṣṇaśastraiḥ khaṇḍaśo vibhakta iti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:586: asti / kasmiṃścin mahāhrade mahākāyās trayo matsyāḥ prativasanti
GK21ttrkhy1u:595: tad ahaṃ pratyutpannamatiṃ yadbhaviṣyaṃ ca gṛhītvānyam
GK21ttrkhy1u:600: yadbhaviṣyas tv āsannavināśas tadvacanam anādṛtya nirārambha eva
GK21ttrkhy1u:604: apakṛṣṭe ca jāle tasmin hrade nāpy ekataro 'vaśiṣṭaḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:605: evaṃ gate pratyutpannamatir mṛtarūpaṃ kṛtvātmānaṃ jalasya
GK21ttrkhy1u:607: tair api svayam eva mṛto mahāmatsya iti kṛtvā parisrotasi sthāpitaḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:613: atha kadācit prasūtāyāṃ ṭīṭibhyāṃ tadbhartṛjijñāsayā samudreṇa
GK21ttrkhy1u:617: atha ṭīṭibhī śūnyam apatyasthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramāvignahṛdayā
GK21ttrkhy1u:624: tatas tena pakṣisamājaṃ kṛtvā niveditaṃ tadapatyaharaṇajaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:629: sarvae eva vayam ākrandena garutmantam udvejayāmaḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:632: asāv api devāsuraraṇanimittam āhūto viṣṇunā garuḍas tat
GK21ttrkhy1u:637: yuktaṃ tvayā nāthena satā samudrāpasadān mamāyaṃ paribhava iti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:639: jñātvā ca devaḥ parihasya samudrasyedam uvāca /
GK21ttrkhy1u:645: iti matvā praṇamya devaṃ samarpitavān iti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:650: kṣutkṣāmatanuḥ kṣudhā parigatān tān sacivān āha /
GK21ttrkhy1u:654: atha tadājñāsamakālam eva te 'raṇye paryaṭanto yadā na kiñcid
GK21ttrkhy1u:655: āseduḥ / tadāsau jambukas taṃ śaṅkukarṇanāmānaṃ karabhaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:670: ahaṃ te dviguṇaṃ śarīraṃ siṃhasakāśād dāpayiṣye /
GK21ttrkhy1u:671: tvayāpy evaṃ vayam ātmā ca saṃvardhitās syur iti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:673: evam abhidhāya siṃhasakāśaṃ gatvā tam āha /
GK21ttrkhy1u:682: tataś caturakas taṃ siṃhaṃ rudhiraraktasarvagātraṃ dṛṣṭvā
GK21ttrkhy1u:687: gate ca tasmiṃś caturakas taṃ kravyamukham āha /
GK21ttrkhy1u:695: tvayā punar mama mukham evāvalokitavyam iti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:696: evam ukte tābhyāṃ kravyam atibahu bhakṣitam /
GK21ttrkhy1u:697: atrāntare siṃhas samprāpto yāvat paśyati sakalaṃ jaṭharapiśitam
GK21ttrkhy1u:701: evaṃ vadati siṃhe kravyamukho mukhaṃ caturakasyāvalokitavān /
GK21ttrkhy1u:711: etasmiṃś cāntare kathamapi ca tatsamīpam atha kaścit sārthavāho
GK21ttrkhy1u:713: tasya ca sārthāgresaraṃ kaṭāhena galabaddhena karabham
GK21ttrkhy1u:714: āgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtakaviṣādo jambukas taṃ siṃham āha /
GK21ttrkhy1u:729: khadyotaṃ dṛṣṭvāgnir ayam ity āhāryaiś śuṣkatṛṇaparṇair
GK21ttrkhy1u:732: tatraikaś śākhāmṛgas tadgatamanā muhurmuhus tam eva
GK21ttrkhy1u:739: athāsāv adhamat tasya tad vacanam avamanyaiva /
GK21ttrkhy1u:740: punaś ca tenāsakṛd vāryamāṇo naiva śāmyati /
GK21ttrkhy1u:741: kiṃ bahunā / tāvat tena karṇābhāśam āgatyāgatya prabalam
GK21ttrkhy1u:742: udvejitaḥ / yāvat tena sahasā gṛhītvā śilāyām āvidhya vigataprāṇaḥ kṛto
GK21ttrkhy1u:745: asti / kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne vaṇiksutau suhṛdau staḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:748: atha tatra dharmabuddhir nāmaikas sārthavāhasuto yas tena kasyacit
GK21ttrkhy1u:751: sa duṣṭabuddhinā saha sampradhārya kṛtārthāv āvāṃ svadeśaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:757: atha duṣṭabuddhir antaḥkaṭhinahṛdayas svārthasiddhaye tam āha /
GK21ttrkhy1u:761: kintv ekam ekaṃ śataṃ gṛhītvā praviśāvaḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:765: tathā cānuṣṭhite śeṣaṃ kutracit suguptaṃ kṛtvā praviṣṭau /
GK21ttrkhy1u:767: bhāgyacchidratayā ca kṣīṇapratyaṃśaḥ punar api ca nidhito
GK21ttrkhy1u:774: evaṃ matvaikākī bhūtvā tām arthamātrām apanīya pradeśaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:777: pratipanne ca dharmabuddhinā saha gatvā tam evoddeśaṃ khātakarma
GK21ttrkhy1u:805: ahaṃ tu tvām adya rātrau vṛkṣavivare 'smin sthāpayāmi /
GK21ttrkhy1u:812: [ upāyaṃ cintayet prājño hy apāyam api cintayet /
GK21ttrkhy1u:818: asti / kasmiṃścid arjunavṛkṣe bakadampatī prativasatas sma /
GK21ttrkhy1u:819: tatra ca vṛkṣavivarānusārī mahākāyo 'hir asañjātakriyāṇy eva
GK21ttrkhy1u:821: tena ca nirvedena naṣṭasañjñāv āhārakriyām utsṛjya
GK21ttrkhy1u:824: māma / kim adyāpy āhāro anuṣṭhīyatae iti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:829: sa tu tasmai yathāvṛttam apatyabhakṣaṇam ākhyātavān /
GK21ttrkhy1u:842: upāyaṃ cintayet prājño hy apāyam api cintayet /
GK21ttrkhy1u:843: iti bruvann api tenāsau nītvā sthāpito vṛkṣavivare /
GK21ttrkhy1u:848: tac ca śrutvā dharmabuddiś cintayām āsa /
GK21ttrkhy1u:854: adyāpy aviplutae eva loke dharmabuddir ahaṃ vijane 'smin vanae
GK21ttrkhy1u:865: kintv asmāt sthānād ekānte 'vasthānaṃ kurudhvam / yāvad aham
GK21ttrkhy1u:871: pradīpte ca vahnau samantata ujjvalībhūtād vṛkṣavivarāt sphaṭitatanuḥ
GK21ttrkhy1u:874: tat tu mahad vaikārikaṃ dṛṣṭvā kim idam iti paraṃ vismayam upagatāḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:875: kiñcij jīvitaṃ ca pratyakṣam abhijñāya vaṇikputraṃ papracchuḥ /
GK21ttrkhy1u:876: kim idam īdṛśam agnipatanam adhyavasitaṃ bhavateti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:878: anena duṣputreṇāham avasthām imāṃ prāpita iti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:886: so 'nyasmin vaṇikputrake tāṃ nikṣipya deśāntaram arthopārjanāya
GK21ttrkhy1u:888: kṣīṇabhāgyatvāc ca tena bahunāpi kālena na kiñcid āsāditam /
GK21ttrkhy1u:889: pratyāgataś ca tāṃ tulāṃ tasmāt prārthitavān /
GK21ttrkhy1u:898: vṛṣyaṃ svādu mṛdu ca lohaṃ katham ākhavo na bhakṣayiṣyanti / iti
GK21ttrkhy1u:900: asāv api suparihṛṣṭahṛdayaḥ pādyādipurassarāṃ tasya pūjāṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:903: tatra snānābhyudyatasya ca tasya svīyaṃ putram ekam
GK21ttrkhy1u:905: asāv api pratyāgacchan dārakam anyasmin mitragṛhe suguptaṃ kṛtvā
GK21ttrkhy1u:907: atha bhojanasamaye sārthavāho dārakam adṛṣṭvā samākulamanāś
GK21ttrkhy1u:913: tac chrutvā paramāvigno nirdayībhūtaś ca taṃ bāhau gṛhītvā
GK21ttrkhy1u:916: anena me dārakaḥ kvāpi gopita iti /
GK21ttrkhy1u:926: yatra tulā lohasahasrasyāsya gehe madīyā mūṣakair bhakṣitā / tatra
GK21ttrkhy1u:928: tac ca śrutvā pratipāditavantas te prāḍvivākāḥ parasparasya
